data.prayer: Spirit, encourage every one of the 15,353 ordinary believers here to care for others, like a shepherd cares for his sheep.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Tomsk, Russia

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Tomsk, Russia.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Father, help the 15,353 believers in Tomsk to know your commands and to do them.
data.verse: For Ezra had devoted himself to the study and observance of the Law of the Lord, and to teaching its decrees and laws in Israel.

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Tomsk with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.prayer: Lord, Let your Kingdom come among the Tomsk Tatar, Siberian people. Let your will be done, as in heaven, so on earth.
Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Tomsk.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the state of Tomsk access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary:
the state of Tomsk, Russia has a population of 1,049,100.

We estimate Tomsk has 15,353 people who might know Jesus, 588,841 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 444,906 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 68 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give every church in the state of Tomsk a passion to plant another simple church.
